content.question: The speechâ€™s point of view can best be used to support which of the following historical arguments about the early 1900s?

choices.label: Most Americans believed that the United States should continue an isolationist foreign policy.
Most Americans asserted that American Indians were unjustly harmed by federal policy toward them.
Some Americans advocated economic development of overseas countries in order to justify imperialism.
Some Americans appealed to racial theories in order to oppose efforts to acquire new territorial possessions.

content.answer: Some Americans advocated economic development of overseas countries in order to justify imperialism.
